title: Ticket #250: Add md5sum/sha1sum checksums to our download tarballs
description:
In order to add md5sum/sha1sum checksums to our download tarballs, we will need to first add detection for the md5sum and sha1sum programs, and the md5 perl module, into configure.

I've already done the md5sum and sha1sum programs, and need to do the perl module work.

The intention of this feature is to create checksums directly on the build machines for the publicly releasable tarballs and rpms for Condor, and to validate the externals that we pull from the web.
